songs.title: Wireless 2012 Freestyle
songs.lyrics:
Cold blooded nigga, hoes love a nigga
She said she only fuck me and no other nigga
Don’t believe her but it’s nice to hear
Never ever thought life was fair
But I’m quite prepared
The boy nice cause he writes sincere
Draw straight from the heart send it right to ears
Think smart, play your part like Tyson here
Nigga I cheated death twice this year
I got the right to wear ice and swear like I never went to college
Or get direct deposits that could never fit in wallets
Clever but I’m ghetto tho I never lived in projects
On a level with the pilots, fuck the devil
This the hottest shit you’ll ever get to ride with
Though you’ll never get beside it
Got it, flow psychotic
Fruits of my labour, ya’ll hoped I rotted
Backpack and mainstream, both how I got it
Nas and Hov at the same damn time
Pac and BIG in the same damn mind
You can have a lot of whips and you can have a lot of chips
And you can have a lot of bitches but you can’t have mine
